item.title: Dislodged kerb edging, 29th October
item.description:
This kerb edging did not look properly secured when the works along nunhead cemetery wall were completed. This corner is regularly clipped by lorries and cars because of the shape of the junction and has now fully dislodged. It might cause damage to a vehicle, more extensive damage to the corner or potentially present a hazard to pedestrians.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockley Footpath, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light up bollard on the crossing on Logs Hill, 29th October
item.description:
